item.title: Admin Spawn Problem
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“xalexo, post:1, topic:382326”]Right so basically admins cant spawn

the admin rights number is 2.

}

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length >= 2) {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("No such item.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				
			}

There is our item command in commands.java

Thanks in advance[/quote]
please use [code ] tags next time…
Try looking for anything to do with playerrights like

if (c.playerRights >= 2) {

item.title: Admin Spawn Problem
item.dc:creator: @xalexo xalexo
item.description:
@xalexo wrote:

Right so basically admins cant spawn

the admin rights number is 2.

}

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length >= 2) {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("No such item.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				
			}

There is our item command in commands.java

Thanks in advance
